parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.76

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds magazine to a unit regardless of locality. This command can also be used to add magazine to a vehicle, like a static gun, for example.

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value> Before <template><title>arma3</title></template> v2.00 this command was broken in MP and duplicated items per the number of clients.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit [[addMagazineGlobal]] magazineName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> magazineName: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[addMagazineGlobal]] "30Rnd_65x39_caseless_mag";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[addMagazine]], [[addMagazines]], [[addMagazineCargo]], [[addMagazineCargoGlobal]], [[addMagazinePool]], [[addMagazineTurret]], [[addMagazineAmmoCargo]]
</value></part></template></root>
